QUALITY ROOF REPAIR AND ROOF REPLACEMENT

With over 25 years’ experience in roof repair, roof replacement and new roof installations. TP Roofing provides prompt, reliable and personal roofing services. We fix your roof leak and solve your roofing problems. Roofing solutions at an affordable price Sydney-wide.

SERVICES

All our roofing work is carried out by fully licensed and insured tradesmen complying with SafeWork NSW regulations.
ROOF REPAIRS ARE WARRENTIED FOR 2 YEARS
ALL NEW ROOFS HAVE A 10 YEAR WORKMANSHIP GUARENTEE

ROOF REPAIR AND ROOF MAINTENANCE

TP Roofing are experts at sourcing and rectifying roof leaks. We prolong the life of your roof by providing roof maintenance services, fixing your leaking roof and delivering the best possible roofing solutions for your roofing needs...

More on roof repair & maintenance >>

ROOF REPLACEMENT (RE-ROOFING)

TP Roofing will replace your roof with the minimum of inconvenience, we excel at liaising with our clients and running our crews efficiently delivering a finished product that enhances your home and protects your most valuable asset...

More on roof replacement >>

NEW ROOF INSTALLATION

TP Roofing installs new tiled roofs of any size or scope Sydney wide. Handpicked by Monier Roofing to join their elite team of Roofing specialists enables us to offer you Monier terracotta and concrete tiles at competitive prices...

More on new roof >>

ABOUT US

We are licensed in roof tiling and roof plumbing.

ROOF SAFETY

As members of the Housing Industry Association (HIA) and The Master Roof Tilers and Slaters Association, we maintain high safety standards. Our insurance policies are up to date and can be provided on request.

MONIER ROOFING SPECIALISTS

TP Roofing were hand-picked to join the Monier Roofing Specialists, which gives us the ability to offer you Monier terracotta and concrete tiles at competitive prices.
